notes: Appear when failing the [[Lightbearer]] event in every city. Could only be killed by summons on test.
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Ability|[[Life Drain]] 0-15|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|[[Cursed|Curses]] you starting with 2 or 3 hp|element=cursed}}|{{Ability|[[Mana Drain]] 0-40|element=manadrain}}|{{Ability|[[Paralyze]]|element=paralyze}}|{{Healing}} }}
name: Essence of Darkness
strategy:
They are slow and only use distance attacks so corner them when trying to kill. Use [[Firebomb]]s or [[Fire Field]]s to trap.
To escape run away and go up or down a level, sewers work well to get out of a city. They may wait for you outside of a [[Protection Zone]] on the same level if no one else distracts them.
